entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as speaking and rising from his seat. He is described as leading Harry out of Mrs. Cole's office.

entities.name: mrs cole
entities.description: Mrs. Cole is mentioned as speaking and getting to her feet. She is described as steady despite having consumed two-thirds of the gin.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being impressed by Mrs. Cole's steadiness and seeing the orphans wearing greyish tunics.

entities.name: the orphans
entities.description: The orphans are described as all wearing the same kind of greyish tunic and looking reasonably well-cared-for.

entities.name: gin
entities.description: Gin is mentioned as being consumed by Mrs. Cole.

relationships.description: Dumbledore leads Harry out of Mrs. Cole's office.
Dumbledore is mentioned as having to return the orphans every summer, implying that he cares for them.
Harry observes the orphans wearing greyish tunics.
